data.title: Top 1000 (and Beyond)
data.meta_description: The Video Game Canon was most recently updated to Version 7.0 on November 18, 2022. Previous Versions of the Video Game Canon: Version 6.0 (2022), Version 5.0 (2021), Version 4.0 (2020), Version 3.…
